#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
const int MAX_N = 1e6+1;
bool prime[MAX_N];
void sieve()
{
  for (int i = 2; i < MAX_N; i++) prime[i] = true;
  for (int i = 2; i*i < MAX_N; i++) if (prime[i]) {
    for (int j = i*i; j < MAX_N; j += i) prime[j] = false;
    }
}
bool isprime(int x)
{
  for (int i = 2; i*i <= x; i++)
    if (x%i == 0) return false;
  return true;
}
int main()
{
  int t;
  scanf ("%d", &t);
  long long p;
  sieve();
  while (t--) {
    scanf ("%Ld", &p);
    long long sq = sqrt(p);
    if (p != 1 && sq*sq == p && prime[sq]) 
      printf ("YES\n");
    else
      printf ("NO\n");
  }
  return 0;
}
